data.name: required
data.value: required, can be any one of SUCCESS,FAILURE,INCONCLUSIVE

links.target: required - UUID of  EiffelCompositionDefinedEvent, EiffelArtifactCreatedEvent, EiffelSourceChangeCreatedEvent, EiffelSourceChangeSubmittedEvent

links.type: CAUSE or CONTEXT or FLOW_CONTEXT or SUB_CONFIDENCE_LEVEL - optional
links.target: required - UUID if type is present
